channel.title: Pip on Often Bearing Metaphoric Tense
channel.description: Recent content in Pip on Often Bearing Metaphoric Tense

item.title: Caching pip packages using devpi & docker
item.description: If you’re using python packages & virtualenvs a lot, you can drastically speed up the time to setup your environment, (which mostly involves download of pip packages, which tend to be network intensive & time consuming) by caching pip packages. Similar to other caching proxies like apt, python has its own caching proxy in the form of devpi, which allows you to run a pypi mirror in your laptop. (devpi is much more than just a pip mirror, for more on its capabilities read the link)
